game.name: School Teacher Simulator
game.shortDescription: 지역 학교의 교사가 되십시오. 아이들을 가르치되, 학생들이 수업 중에 집중하고 잘못된 행동을 하면 대응하도록 하십시오. 방학 중 학생들 사이에 문제가 있으면 쉬는 시간에도 집중하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Become a teacher in a local school. Teach kids, but make sure that your students stay focused during the lesson and react if they misbehave. Each day has unique events. Living school environment with each teacher and student having their own personality.
